rules.caption: FPS stonkz: %s
rules.tooltip:
Choose minecraft's renderer.

Note that Sodium, Iris, and Optifine are all still in their betas for 1.17, and may be buggy (expecially Iris).

rules.caption: Tech Mods: %s
rules.tooltip:
Technical Mods:

Carpet Mod
Item Scroller
Litematica
Mini Hud
Tweakeroo

These all still work on vanilla servers.

rules.caption: Eye Candy: %s
rules.tooltip:
Eye Candy Mods:

Armor Hud
Capes
Charmonium
Clear Despawn
Damage Tilt
Fabulous Clouds
Falling Leaves
Illuminations
Minimal Menu
Not Enough Animations
Seamless Loading Screen
whyamionfire

These are all subtle visual enhancements all with a vanilla feel. Should not make more than a few fps difference.

rules.caption: Other: %s
rules.tooltip:
Other:

These mods are not compatable (yet), and so are their own category for now. Starlight is higly recommended.
